lead_paragraph: Mr. Ek, 70, a major figure in the European dance world, is calling a two-year halt to performances of his works.
snippet: Mr. Ek, 70, a major figure in the European dance world, is calling a two-year halt to performances of his works.

headline.main: Mats Ek, the Swedish Choreographer, Says His Goodbye Isn’t Quite a Farewell
headline.print_headline: Choreographer Says His Goodbye Isn’t a Farewell

abstract: Acclaimed Swedish choreographer Mats Ek counters news reports announcing his stage farewell at backstage interview during performance of his works in Paris; 70-year-old clarifies that he will stop creating new pieces and pull his dances from repertories in order to take a break for indeterminate time period.
